content: *Applicable for the selected users who have such files and folders.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe a condition under which certain personal data can be deleted. It informs users that they are eligible to delete specific files and folders related to their profile.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Belə fayl və qovluqları olan seçilmiş istifadəçilərə aiddir' doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Applicable for the selected users who have such files and folders.' The word 'aiddir' (belongs to) implies ownership rather than applicability. It suggests the files and folders belong *to* the selected users, not that the action applies to them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Belə fayl və qovluqlara malik olan seçilmiş istifadəçilərə tətbiq oluna bilər.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'そのようなファイルやフォルダを持っている選択したユーザーに適用されます' is overly literal and a bit awkward. It doesn't flow naturally in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning with better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 選択したユーザーが該当するファイルやフォルダを持っている場合に適用されます。(Sentaku shita yūzā ga kōtō suru fairu ya fōlda o motte iru baai ni shōkei saremasu.) - This translates to 'Applies when the selected users have applicable files and folders.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '해당 파일 및 폴더를 보유하고 있는 선택한 사용자에게 적용됩니다' is a bit literal and awkward.  '보유하고 있는' (bo-yu-ha-go it-neun) implies 'possessing' or 'holding'. It can be improved to sound more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 해당 파일 및 폴더를 가진 사용자에 해당합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ໃຊ້ໄດ້ກັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ເລືອກທີ່ມີໄຟລ໌ ແລະໂຟນເດີ້ດັ່ງກ່າວ' doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'applicable for the selected users who have such files and folders.' It's a bit literal and could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ໄດ້ກັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ເລືອກທີ່ມິໄຟລ໌ ແລະໂຟນເດີ້ເຫຼົ່ານີ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Se referă la toți utilizatorii selectați, care au astfel de fișiere și foldere' implies it refers to *all* selected users, whereas the English 'Applicable for the selected users who have such files and folders' implies it only applies to selected users who *actually* have the files and folders. The Romanian translation doesn't convey the conditional nature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se aplică utilizatorilor selectați care au astfel de fișiere și foldere.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'තෝරාගත් පරිශීලකයින් සඳහා අදාළ වන අතර ඔවුන් එවැනි ෆයිල් සහ ෆෝල්ඩර් තිබේ නම්' is a bit verbose and doesn't perfectly capture the conciseness of the English original. A more direct translation would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් පරිශීලකයින්ට saja වල ෆයිල් හා ෆෝල්ඩර් තිබේ නම් වල.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated use of 'වල' makes the translation sound clunky. Reducing the number of instances improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් පරිශීලකයින්ට saja ෆයිල් හා ෆෝල්ඩර් තිබේ නම්.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Применљиво' is a correct equivalent of 'Applicable' but lacks the nuance of 'relevant' or 'pertaining to'. A more accurate translation might better reflect the original meaning in context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Применљиво за одабране кориснике који поседују такве датотеке и фолдере.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Primenljivo' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Applicable.' 'Applicable' implies relevance or suitability. 'Primenljivo' translates more closely to 'applicable' in the sense of 'being applied' or 'implementable.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Relevantno' or 'Važi za' to better convey the meaning of 'applicable' in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'foldere' is a less common and less preferred spelling. The preferred spelling is 'foldere'.

The translation "Bu tür dosya ve klasörlere sahip olan seçili kullanıcılar için geçerlidir." is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Applicable for the selected users who have such files and folders' implies relevance or suitability, which isn't perfectly conveyed. A more natural phrasing might emphasize relevance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seçili kullanıcıların bu tür dosya ve klasörlere sahip olması durumunda geçerlidir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Áp dụng cho những người dùng đã chọn có các tập tin và thư mục đó' doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Applicable for the selected users who have such files and folders.' It's a bit clunky. A more natural translation would imply applicability *because* they have those files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Áp dụng cho những người dùng đã chọn và có các tập tin, thư mục liên quan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation includes a comma before 'các tập tin, thư mục đó.' While not strictly incorrect, omitting the comma would make it flow more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Áp dụng cho những người dùng đã chọn có các tập tin và thư mục đó.
